markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cooperative Nature](/Feats.aspx?ID=4475) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 64 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

The short human life span lends perspective and has taught you from a young age to set aside differences and work with others to achieve greatness. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus on checks to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75).
name: Cooperative Nature
